USA: Gunfight at the O.K. Corral: A gunfight takes place in Tombstone, Arizona Territory.
James Garfield is inaugurated President of the United States.
Chester A. Arthur is inaugurated President of the United States.
Clara Barton founds the American Red Cross.
Billy the Kid is shot and killed by Sheriff Pat Garrett.
A Century of Dishonor is written by Helen Hunt Jackson.
Sudan: Mahdist War: A war began against the United Kingdom and Egypt
Russia: Constitution proposed, Alexander II agrees to it but doesn't get a chance to sign it
Alexander was assassinated by Ignacy Hryniewiecki of the People's Will. His son, Alexander III, becomes tsar.
Persia officially recognized Russia's annexation of Khwarazm in the Treaty of Akhal.
Chile: Chilean troops occupy Lima, the capital of Perú. Boundary treaty of 1881 between Chile and Argentina.
Barbados: The Executive Council is created separate of the Upper House by an Act of local Parliament.
Albania: Ottoman forces crushed Albanian resistance fighters at Prizren. The leaders of the League of Prizren and their families were arrested and deported.
